Name: Checkpoint Charlie
Review Text: Great pub in AMS! Not that populated, friendly stuff and on top of that reasonable prices... Highly recommend

Name: Checkpoint Charlie
Review Text: Coffee is terrible and the caf√© suffers a severe nicotine and even marihuana smell from the people who smoke in front of the caf√©. ‚Ä¶

Name: Checkpoint Charlie
Review Text: I absolutely love this place for every reason I can think of!  The staff here is so nice and go the extra mile all the time. The drinks and snacks are affordable and good quality, but what I really like is the atmosphere. Such cool seating ‚Ä¶

Name: Checkpoint Charlie
Review Text: Lovely place! The bartender Wolverine is an actor.

Name: Checkpoint Charlie
Review Text: Super Friendly people and nice atmosphere! Worth to have a drink there. Check inside, you might find something you like! :)

Name: Checkpoint Charlie
Review Text: Cozy place, with a home feel. Fun games, good books and whatever you like. From tea to whiskey, bitter balls to tosti. Certainly a fun place to be, be sure to visit with a small group.

Name: Checkpoint Charlie
Review Text: Place of the soul, the perfect Caf√©, the place where I would like to be every evening, in every moment. Music, people, beers, billiard, pinball machines, books, lights, words and laughter. Everything you need, always. My favorite place in Amsterdam. And our dream is to come one day to sing at Check Point Charlie!‚ù§

Name: Checkpoint Charlie
Review Text: Nice friendly pub.Good tap beer and some food is served here.There's a little stage for occasional band or other live performance.Cosy place with lots of books,games,cards,chess and a small pool table...there's even a classical guitar there in the corner for anyone who's brave enough.All in all a trendy pub for all ages.

Name: Checkpoint Charlie
Review Text: Very nice location. Kind and smart staff. Lecker Beer for good prices

Name: Checkpoint Charlie
Review Text: Lovely spot, staff are fantastic and atmosphere is great.

Name: Checkpoint Charlie
Review Text:
Carina was absolutely gorgeous and caring host!

She knows about drinks and as a beer sommelier, she was excellent. ‚Ä¶

Name: Checkpoint Charlie
Review Text: Great authentic pub with lots of space, have a worldly social thinking and hosting great events.

Name: Checkpoint Charlie
Review Text: Nice Berlin-like caf√© with a lot of beers and a really nice host standing behind the bar. Unfortunately not many snacks.

Name: Checkpoint Charlie
Review Text: Good selection of beers and drinks. Lively place with great music and a nice mix of all kinds of  people. Nice interior but also plenty of space to sit outside. One of my favorites!

Name: Checkpoint Charlie
Review Text: Great beer and very welcomingüçª

Name: Checkpoint Charlie
Review Text: Great beer on tap, lively location and a pinball machine + pool.

Name: Checkpoint Charlie
Review Text: Drinks and snacks with good music, nice people and staff. You can smoke outside, there are many tables. In the summer is a super place to enjoy the evening with friends.

Name: Checkpoint Charlie
Review Text:
Great relatively young business that has become a thriving hub of cultural activities, hosting spoken word, comedy & music. The prices are reasonable.
It's pretty reflective of the local, extremely varied deomographic which I love. ‚Ä¶

Name: Checkpoint Charlie
Review Text: A brilliant bar situated a 10 minute tram journey away from the hustle and bustle of the narrow streets and canals of Amsterdam.  Incredibly friendly, welcoming staff.  A great range of beers.  Pool table.  Lots of live music and DJs ‚Ä¶

Name: Checkpoint Charlie
Review Text: Great place! just keep in mind that for now they open at 15:00 on weekdays loads of games, pool and a pinball machine yay

Name: Checkpoint Charlie
Review Text: Very nice place with nice barman!

Name: Checkpoint Charlie
Review Text: An interesting place with space to sit outside under cover at a busy junction.  Has some great music sessions despite its unfortunate internal layout.  The musicians are around the corner out of site of the bar.  Good beer but no food.

Name: Checkpoint Charlie
Review Text: Berlin style, laid back cafe-bar. Great decoration make you feel at home. There are some table games but most are in Dutch. There is a Pool and some books as well. Recommended!

Name: Checkpoint Charlie
Review Text: Great place to come and sit for some snacks/bar food, and a couple good beers. Had a very large and open lounge area that you could relax and enjoy your drink or food.

Name: Checkpoint Charlie
Review Text: Inside is really awesome. You should visit that place.

Name: Checkpoint Charlie
Review Text:
Pleasant pub with nice atmosphere, ample space inside both for seating and standing, and they have a pool table!
Keep an eye on the events they organize - as they're usually hosting comedy nights, open mic, concerts...

Name: Checkpoint Charlie
Review Text: Cozy and friendly pub with good vibes. You can go there just for drinks and the events they have there. I went there for the Spoken word night: Word Up! And it was really good  showcasing local, expat and foreign creatives' talents.

Name: Checkpoint Charlie
Review Text: A rare pearl lost somewhere in Amsterdam. Different looking place for an happy drink with friends. Love so much the interiors, the style, that corner with old sofas. üíú ‚Ä¶

Name: Checkpoint Charlie
Review Text:
Nice bar, lounge chairs and beer!

Altho the pool table is of the small variety you can enjoy a game and relax in ‚Ä¶

Name: Checkpoint Charlie
Review Text: My friendly local bar. Great choice of beers. Alternative crowd and music. Pool table, pinball machine. Eclectic vintage interior. Street art on the exterior by 'London Police'.

Name: Checkpoint Charlie
Review Text: Very nice new year party. Cool staff and good beers. If you want to be in cool place and a bit far away from central chaos Checkpoint Charlie is what you are looking for.

Name: Checkpoint Charlie
Review Text: Laid back atmosphere, friendly staff, cool art, great beers (both on tap and bottled), and free fun events (pop- and pub quizzes, comedy, spoken word) and live shows! Like them on facebook to get notifications on the when and whats :)

Name: Checkpoint Charlie
Review Text: Great place to have a Beer. The people at this place are so friendly.  Also this place host Comedy Nights so if you are looking for a great place to have fun then this is the place. You can have your Brews inside or outside.

Name: Checkpoint Charlie
Review Text: Great vibes, welcoming staff. Great beer, food, games, pool and people!

Name: Checkpoint Charlie
Review Text: Good beer, friendly staff, good music, nice curtains. It was a brief visit today, I'm eager to come again and confirm a fifth star.

Name: Checkpoint Charlie
Review Text:
Great staff, great beers, great tunes.

Its just a decent Dutch bar, one of the relative few that doesn't a) cater ‚Ä¶

Name: Checkpoint Charlie
Review Text: Best bar in town!

Name: Checkpoint Charlie
Review Text: Really great bar with super selection of beers at good value. Don‚Äôt fool yourself going to the more central exorbitant tourist bars. This is the place to see the real Amsterdam.

Name: Checkpoint Charlie
Review Text: Great bar! Most welcoming place in Amsterdam. Very open and friendly atmosphere. The people working there are really nice too. Jaro is the best!

Name: Checkpoint Charlie
Review Text: Nice hangout, lots of retro items and good vibe, just watch your tab. We got over charged and the bar tender grabbed ice with his bare hand after handling money...

Name: Checkpoint Charlie
Review Text: Great atmosphere. Perfect place to have a beer and some snacks

Name: Checkpoint Charlie
Review Text: Friendly casual bar with a authentic crowd. Play some pinball or relax in a comfortable lazy chair. Good selection of beers on draft, tasty snacks.

Name: Checkpoint Charlie
Review Text: Cosy interior, poorly isolated construction made it a little noisy though. Good selection of drinks, medium value. No table service, which the staff could perhaps have pointed out in a little bit more friendly way even with Amsterdam standards.

Name: Checkpoint Charlie
Review Text: One of the highlights in the neighbourhood is Cafe CC. It is located on a corner with a view on two streets, a channel (Westerkanaal) and a bridge that sometimes is lifted up for passing boats. Checkpoint Charlie has a great outdoor space ‚Ä¶

Name: Checkpoint Charlie
Review Text: Nice atmosphere, good collection of boardgames

Name: Checkpoint Charlie
Review Text: Great place to spend the evening, meet friends and have a beer. Nice drinks and food!!

Name: Checkpoint Charlie
Review Text: Great venue for acoustic music... we've hosted plenty of shows there and always get a great reception - jaro the owner is also a great guy ;)

Name: Checkpoint Charlie
Review Text:
Cool place, cool bartenders, fly music.

(Edit:) To expand a bit: ‚Ä¶

Name: Checkpoint Charlie
Review Text: A really nice and friendly place. I was there for one of their stand-up comedy evenings and had a really good time.

Name: Checkpoint Charlie
Review Text: Great pub/bar, with pool table, games, big space, seats outside, any time you looking somewhere to go but dunno where that is A place. Perfect Vibe.

Name: Checkpoint Charlie
Review Text: Always a nice place ti hang out in the evening. Great choice of music. Friendly staff. Mixed crowd

Name: Checkpoint Charlie
Review Text: lol jk

Name: Checkpoint Charlie
Review Text: A very nice bar with good atmosphere. The beer is also very tasty. Mostly a good place for meeting friends

Name: Checkpoint Charlie
Review Text: Great place to enjoy with friends a couple of good beers in a cozy and familiar atmosphere. Not for shiny beardy hipsters and that's the way we love it!

Name: Checkpoint Charlie
Review Text: Great bar!!

Name: Checkpoint Charlie
Review Text: neighborhood bar of a Christmas night! Very friendly and cozy environment. If I was living in Amsterdam I would not share this review with anyone.

Name: Checkpoint Charlie
Review Text:
One of the best pubs in Westerpark.

Name: Checkpoint Charlie
Review Text: Nice pub, ideal to just hang out and talk. The German beer selection is also quite to my taste.

Name: Checkpoint Charlie
Review Text: nice cozy place to stop for a beer and meet friends after work expect around 4 to 6 euro a drink

Name: Checkpoint Charlie
Review Text: Dammit, if only I had knew it was that awesome, I would have just spend all my evenings there. You got a more than lovely staff, couches that feel like home and board games that will get you back to your childhood. Bref, a must go qui fait plaisir !

Name: Checkpoint Charlie
Review Text: Great friendly bar, excellent night of comedy run by maestro Ken Parsons, very funny, should not be missed

Name: Checkpoint Charlie

Name: Checkpoint Charlie

Name: Checkpoint Charlie
